definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: And suddenly you look at the gas mileage on the car on the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 突然你看到汽車儀表盤上的油耗情況。

sentences.english: Adding of calculation function of constant speed fuel consumption.
sentences.chinese: 增加計算等速油耗功能。

sentences.english: Tuneups improve performance as well as gas mileage.
sentences.chinese: 調整會改善性能降低油耗。

sentences.english: The engineers' most important goals are reductions in fuel consumption and jet engine noise.
sentences.chinese: 工程師的最重要目的是減少油耗和發動機噪音。

sentences.english: The fuel consumption is reduced by about 7% than Comoro CG engine.
sentences.chinese: 油耗更低，比普通CG機降低油耗7%左右。

sentences.english: The fuel consumption is reduced by about 7% than Comoro CG engine.
sentences.chinese: 油耗更低，比普通CG機降低油耗7%左右。

sentences.english: What's more, cars should be improved to consume less oil.
sentences.chinese: 而且，汽車應被改進爲消費低油耗。

sentences.english: An intelligent fuel consumption monitor based on weight measurement for fuel consumption rate is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種基於重量法測量燃油消耗率的智能型油耗儀。

sentences.english: Keeping plugs in good condition will cut your fuel consumption.
sentences.chinese: 使火星塞保持良好狀態可降低油耗。

sentences.english: The way you drive and take care of your car can make a big difference in your gas mileage.
sentences.chinese: 你的駕駛舉止和車的維護會使油耗大不一樣。

sentences.english: Larger engines and higher horsepower typically result in lower gas mileage.
sentences.chinese: 大發動機和大馬力會增高油耗。

sentences.english: And it has dictated tough new energy standards for lighting and gas mileage for cars.
sentences.chinese: 此外中國出臺了嚴厲的照明和汽車油耗的新能源標準。

sentences.english: I'd calculate our gas mileage -- figure out useless statistics on things like grocery spending.
sentences.chinese: 我會計算油耗還有雜貨花銷等雞毛蒜皮的小事。

definition: discharge volume/engine capacity/engine displacement (volume of air fuel mixture drawn in during one cycle)
Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
